quote: I’m not sure what’s more worrying. The list of demands or the fact he seems unaware the French stopped using francs in the last century and that Africa is a continent?” - Jerome
quote_letters: IM NOT SURE WHATS MORE WORRYING THE LIST OF DEMANDS OR THE FACT HE SEEMS UNAWARE THE FRENCH STOPPED USING FRANCS IN THE LAST CENTURY AND THAT AFRICA IS A CONTINENT - JEROME
